messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Mother's City Ten. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Research Initiatives

Cargo: Your station has been chosen for an epidemiological research project. Send us your cargo shuttle to receive your research samples.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Rick Sanchez. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Mother's City Ten's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.
